pr_title: [KOGITO-2537] Consume and persist TraceEvents in trusty-service

timeline.bodyText: Could you use @JsonProperty and also @JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)? If the consumer of the TraceEvent is not using the same version of the package of the producer and it gets a payload with a new property it is going to fail because the two components would not be properly decoupled. An exception would be raised during the deserialization
timeline.author: r00ta

timeline.bodyText: Could you use @JsonProperty and also @JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)?
